AseeSubtitle.description: Allows a user to display subtitle with full style customization.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

text.description: Text to display. Markdown is not supported.

bottomGap.description: Number of pixels in gap to below element.

containerStyle.description: Style of the subtitle container in css format.

componentStyle.description: Style of the subtitle component in css format.
